about_the_game:
This game is a top-down 2d shooter where you play as a new age bugbot searching for energy crystals form the enemy old rusty bots that are trying to dominate you and your kind. Watching out for enemies that are trying to destroy you and obstacles that can that deal demage. This small game has all 10 levels.

Press [ 1 ] for Control A or [ 2 ] for Control B.

Control A:
Aim with mouse to go in the direction you want to go.
Forward is [ ↑ ] or [ W ].
Strafe right/left of bugbot is [→] / [←] or [ A ] / [ D ].
Backward is [ ↓ ] or [ S ]

Control B:
Move mouse to aim.
Up is [ ↑ ] or [W].
Right/left is [→] / [←] or [ A ] / [ D ] .
Down is [ ↓ ] or [ S ] .

Left mouse Button is to Fire.
[ ESC ] to Pause.

Watching out for enemies that are trying to destroy you and obstacles that can that deal demage. This small game has all 10 levels.

Control B:

Right/left is [→] / [←] or [ A ] / [ D ] .

Left mouse Button is to Fire.
[ ESC ] to Pause.
name: BugBots

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600K CPU @ 3.40GHz 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8.00 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 285 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: I do not know what the Least to Best, But this should run on almost sny setup and it's a simple 2d game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600K CPU @ 3.40GHz 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 285 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: I do not know what the Least to Best, But this should run on almost sny setup and it's a simple 2d game.

short_description: This game is a top-down 2d shooter where you play as a bugbot searching for energy crystals, watching out for enemies and obstacles.
